articles.title: Ohio transfers sick inmate to death house ahead of execution
articles.description: COLUMBUS, Ohio — Ohio started final preparations Tuesday for executing a sick inmate who will be provided a wedge-shaped pillow to help him breathe as he's put to death this week. Death row prisoner Alva Campbell, who has said he is too ill for lethal injecti…

articles.title: Ohio still plans to execute ill inmate despite delays
